description: Complete system overview documenting the Agent Trust Protocol architecture, quantum-safe security approach, and core components interaction
Detailed documentation of the trust scoring system, including calculation algorithms, factors considered, and progression rules between trust levels
Comprehensive documentation of the hybrid cryptographic system combining classical Ed25519 with post-quantum Dilithium signatures, including key generation and verification workflows
Technical specification of the policy evaluation engine, including rule processing algorithms, trust validation logic, and policy execution optimization
Detailed documentation of core data models including Agent, Trust Level, Policy, and their relationships within the ATP ecosystem
